result.purpose: Responsible for managing wallet operations, including configuration, routing, and dependency injection for the wallet manager application.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, utilizing dependency injection for managing components and services within the wallet manager application.

cmd/wallet_manager/config.go.purpose: Defines the configuration schema for the wallet manager application.

cmd/wallet_manager/main.go.purpose: Initializes and starts the wallet manager application.

cmd/wallet_manager/routes.go.purpose: Defines route groups for public and private API endpoints in a wallet management service.

cmd/wallet_manager/wire.go.purpose: This file sets up dependency injection for the wallet manager application using Google Wire.

cmd/wallet_manager/wire_gen.go.purpose: Generates dependency injection code for the wallet manager application.
